summary: REQ-18 appears implemented: AboutSection first paragraph now states "8+ years". However, two additional non-requested files were also modified (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json), which may violate the constraint to keep changes limited to the About section copy update.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository metadata/summary files beyond the requested About section copy change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constrained changes to the About section copy update only; these files are not required to satisfy REQ-18.
